name: Summer Meals for Kids
description: Free summer meals for all children 18 and under at community sites - no paperwork required
fullDescription: Free summer meals are available for children and teens 18 and under at schools, parks, libraries, and community sites throughout the Bay Area when school is out.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free breakfast and/or lunch
- No registration required at most sites
- No income verification
- Available at parks, libraries, schools, community centers
- Open to all children 18 and under
howToGetIt:
1. Text "FOOD" to 304-304 to find nearby sites
2. Or call 2-1-1 for summer meal locations
3. Visit the CA Summer Meal Finder website
4. Just show up - no paperwork required
5. Sites operate throughout summer months
keywords: summer meals, free lunch, summer food, kids meals, summer feeding, SFSP, children, no school
